io.github.robolib.control

Class XBoxController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.robolib.control.GenericHID
      • io.github.robolib.control.Joystick
        • io.github.robolib.control.XBoxController

  • public class XBoxController
extends Joystick
    A better Joystick implementation for the XBox Controller.
    Author:
    noriah Reuland
